name: Kinder Fighter
description:
Kinder Fighter

It´s a little game where you have to prevent two babies from fighting.  Created for GDevelop Game Jam #3 just by me .  The theme was Separation.

Controls:
  • Mouse only
Recommendations:
  • Download and install the game for a better experience.
  • The web does not keep records.
  • You can play it in your phone from the web. Just press "Play Game".

This is my first GDevelop game.

You can play it in Liluo too.

I hope you enjoy it <3
